data.comment: Today's referee, Stuart Attwell, has blown to start the match.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Adam Lallana of Brighton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 6, Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Tariq Lamptey (Brighton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 8, Brighton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 12, Yves Bissouma for Brighton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Brighton are coming forward and Ben White gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Stuart Attwell awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace have been given a penalty at Selhurst Park...
In the minute 18, Mathew Ryan is booked for the away team.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Wilfried Zaha.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Brighton.
Ball goes out of play for a Brighton goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brighton's half?
In the minute 26, Brighton's Neal Maupay is on target but unsuccessful.
Brighton surge into the attack at Selhurst Park but Neal Maupay’s header is off-target.
Stuart Attwell awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
In the minute 28, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Brighton's half.
In the minute 30, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Brighton needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 34, Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in London.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Throw-in for Brighton at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 38, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a Brighton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In the minute 41, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 43, Yves Bissouma (Brighton) has received a first yellow card.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Crystal Palace, close to Brighton's area.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Selhurst Park.
The second-half is underway in London.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Neal Maupay of Brighton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
James McArthur is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 51, Crystal Palace's James McArthur is back in action after a slight knock.
Brighton's Solly March has run offside.
Crystal Palace's Michy Batshuayi is whistled for offside at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In London Brighton attack through Leandro Trossard. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 54, Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Neal Maupay (Brighton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 57, Attention is being given to Crystal Palace’s Cheikhou Kouyate and play has been suspended briefly.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Neal Maupay for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 58, Cheikhou Kouyate returns to the field for Crystal Palace after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in London.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Tyrick Mitchell (Crystal Palace) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 64, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 67, Lewis Dunk (Brighton) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Brighton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton drive upfield and Yves Bissouma gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
In the minute 69, Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Brighton, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Brighton's Yves Bissouma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 70, Brighton's Yves Bissouma gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 74, Brighton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Stuart Attwell awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Vicente Guaita (Crystal Palace) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
Can Brighton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 78, The away team replace Adam Lallana with Alexis MacAllister.
Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a second substitution, with Aaron Connolly replacing Leandro Trossard.
Stuart Attwell awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Stuart Attwell signals a Brighton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 82, Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
The away team have replaced Dan Burn with Pascal Gross. This is the third substitution made today by Graham Potter.
In the minute 83, Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Stuart Attwell signals a Brighton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Roy Hodgson is making the team's first substitution at Selhurst Park with Luka Milivojevic replacing Michy Batshuayi.
In the minute 84, Brighton's Yves Bissouma misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, James McArthur (Crystal Palace) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Brighton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Christian Benteke is on a sub for Jeffrey Schlupp for Crystal Palace.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Brighton at Selhurst Park.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Brighton.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace's Gary Cahill looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a Brighton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Neal Maupay (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Goal! Alexis MacAllister equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Aaron Connolly with an assist there.
At Selhurst Park, Lewis Dunk is shown a red card and sent off.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Gary Cahill, who is grimacing with pain.
